content:
I just applied GF#14222, and added this paragraph to the spec:

Servers that do support versioning SHALL ensure that Resource.meta.versionId is not present on resources they return, and SHALL update the value of Resource.meta.lastUpdated correctly.
I believe that these are true based on our definitions... does anyone disagree?
Systems that support versioning SHALL ensure that versionId is NOT present? That sounds a little weird...
